Dave has a confident and seasoned grasp of all of the technical aspects of high-level training. But, in addition and, perhaps more important for his clients, he possesses that critical instinct for those moments in a workout where effort meets resistance in the most productive way possible. Dave is keenly attuned to the "Zen" of the training session. To work with him is to experience intense focus ‚Äì one's own and also his. Plus, I grew some better-than-average guns.

I worked with both Miriam and ET in preparation for my wedding. Both did an excellent job! They made sure my nutrition was on point and they pushed me hard at every training session. They clearly have been in the fitness industry for quite some time and know their stuff! In addition, ET and Miriam made the entire process fun, something I'd never experienced before when working out.
‚Äî Kristen L.
I have been very fortunate to have had Eric-Todd as a personal trainer. I worked with Eric-Todd for well over a year, and I can truly say that without him I never would have achieved my weight loss goals, and have kept the weight off. Eric-Todd is so inspiring, and he truly cares about your goals. I have become a stronger person, physically and mentally, all because I was pushed to places I never knew I could go!
‚Äî Brittany
I once hired a trainer a couple years ago from another group and I quit after the first session. I figured I would fizzle out quickly here as well. I am happy to announce I was wrong. I was lucky to meet and work with Miriam. The workouts are challenging but Miriam makes the session fun and the time move quickly. I now actually look forward to coming in and doing my workout. I was hoping to tone my 47 year old body and I am happy to say its working!
‚Äî Andrew W.
I have been training with Gerri Clark at Transform Personal Training for three and a half years. The photo shows me, at age 73, deadlifting 225 pounds ‚Äî a direct result of Gerri's unfailing patience, enthusiasm, and encouragement. Whatever your goal may be, I can unhesitatingly recommend training with Gerri. She will work with you to figure out your goals, and then she will be with you every step of the way.
‚Äî Steve B. Age 73, Deadlifting 225 lbs

‚Äî Abha B. Lost 35 lbs in 6 Months

I'm much stronger and can now do many of the little things whose loss made me despair at the prospect of getting old.
